thread.section_title: Biblio.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Biblio.com | www.biblio.com | 13 of 97
thread.title: Ian Crowley

author: Ian Crowley
title: Ian Crowley
text: I have sent multiple requests to Biblio to find out what has happened to my order. They either reply with the same automated response with the same incorrect delivery dates or they don't respond at all. I can only assume there has been a problem with the order but Biblio either cannot or will not help me. Biblio will fail you completely if there is any sort of issue with your order. Shop elsewhere.
